Title: Requires certain buildings display domestic violence signs in their bathrooms
Summary: Requires certain buildings display domestic violence signs developed by the office for the prevention of domestic violence in their bathrooms.
LawCode: Amd §575, Exec L; add §§206-g & 390-f, Gen Bus L; add §389-a, Pub Auth L; add §148, Pub Bldg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, the general business law, the public authorities law, and the public buildings law, in relation to requiring certain buildings display domestic violence signs in their bathrooms
